long_description: we're new england's top provider of hemp-derived minor cannabinoids, offering bulk extracts, custom formulations, and quality products that utilize the full power of the plant. our mission is personal. and although the industry has had a significant evolution over the last decade, many dispensaries still primarily focus on major cannabinoids thc and cbd, leaving the potential of minor cannabinoids untapped. after years of struggling to find more diverse formulas, we formed bay state extracts. since 2019, our team has worked to expand access to all cannabis has to offer through policy advocacy, education, and our own catalog of quality products. we equip dispensaries with a broader selection of cannabinoids and more targeted solutions for their customers' needs. we'll supply your brand's wholesale isolates, distillates, custom blends and more â€” with no order minimum. our products can be purchased directly on our website and shipped to your door within 24 hours. our products are manufactured in accordance with the massachusetts department of agricultural resource's hemp processing and manufacturing guidelines, as well as the ma cannabis control commission's guidance for hemp products.

generated_description: bay state hemp, legally known as bay state hemp company, based in wareham, massachusetts, is a licensed processor and manufacturer of hemp-derived products. established in 2019, the company specializes in providing bulk cannabinoid extracts and products, focusing on minor and rare cannabinoids that are not commonly found in dispensaries. bay state hemp collaborates with the massachusetts department of agricultural resources and the cannabis control commission to support the massachusetts hemp industry survive and thrive amendment. the company sources 100% of its materials from certified industrial hemp farmers in massachusetts and offers a range of products including tinctures, vapes, pre-rolls, and custom formulations. bay state hemp is committed to policy advocacy, education, and the supply of high-quality hemp products.
